// userActions.js
export var UPDATE_PROFILE_PICTURE='UPDATE_PROFILE_PICTURE';export var UPDATE_USERNAME='UPDATE_USERNAME';export var UPDATE_PREFERENCES='UPDATE_PREFERENCES';export var updateProfilePicture=function updateProfilePicture(pictureUrl){return{type:UPDATE_PROFILE_PICTURE,payload:pictureUrl};};export var updateUsername=function updateUsername(username){return{type:UPDATE_USERNAME,payload:username};};export var updatePreferences=function updatePreferences(preferences){return{type:UPDATE_PREFERENCES,payload:preferences};};
